name: io.github.Raistlin82/btp-sap-odata-to-mcp-server-optimized
description: Enterprise SAP OData to MCP Server with AI capabilities and Cloud Foundry integration

environment_variables.name: SAP_IAS_URL
environment_variables.description: URL of the SAP Identity Authentication Service tenant

environment_variables.name: SAP_IAS_CLIENT_ID
environment_variables.description: Client ID for the OAuth application in IAS

environment_variables.name: SAP_IAS_CLIENT_SECRET
environment_variables.description: Client Secret for the OAuth application in IAS

environment_variables.name: SAP_DESTINATION_NAME
environment_variables.description: Name of the BTP destination used for service discovery

environment_variables.name: ODATA_DISCOVERY_MODE
environment_variables.description: OData discovery mode: pattern, business, whitelist, or all

environment_variables.name: PORT
environment_variables.description: The port on which the Express server will listen
